text:
Compare between primitive building
process & modern building process?
Primitive building process
• Simple design
• Primitive tools
• Local building materials
• Slow building process
(Long time)
• Limited number of
workers
• Small buildings
Modern building process
• More complicated design
• Developed design and
construction tools
• Multiple origins building
materials
• Quick building process (short
time)
• Large number of workers
(design and building)
• High-rise and modern
building
trans:
Comparer les constructions primitives
processus & processus de construction moderne ?
Processus de construction primitif
• Conception simple
• Outils primitifs
• Matériaux de construction locaux
• Processus de construction lent
(Long temps)
• Nombre limité de
travailleurs
• Petits immeubles
Processus de construction moderne
• Conception plus complexe
• Conception et
outils de construction
• Construction d’origines multiples
matériaux
• Processus de construction rapide (court
temps)
• Grand nombre de travailleurs
(conception et construction)
• Grande hauteur et modernité
Bâtiment
